meanings.sent1: The rhombencephala live in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study different species of rhombencephala.
meanings.sent3: The rhombencephala had a party under the sea.
meanings.sent4: The rhombencephala danced gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent5: The colorful rhombencephala caught the eye of the diver.

meanings.sent1: The rhombencephala is an important part of the brain.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the functions of the rhombencephala.
meanings.sent3: The rhombencephala in the brain told jokes to the cerebrum.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts swirled in her rhombencephala like a whirlpool.
meanings.sent5: The rhombencephala controls balance and coordination in animals.
